00015 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00016 {
00017   char buf[512];
00018   sockaddr_in server_sa;
00019   int fd, rc;
00020 
00021   if (argc!=3) {
00022     usage();
00023     exit(-1);
00024   }
00025 
00026   if (toupper(argv[1][0])=='K') {
00027     cerr << "Using kernel stack.\n";
00028     if (minet_init(MINET_KERNEL)<0) {
00029       cerr << "Stack initialization failed.\n";
00030       goto err;
00031     } else {
00032       cerr << "Stack initialized.\n";
00033     }
00034   } else {
00035     cerr << "Using Minet User Level Stack.\n";
00036     if (minet_init(MINET_USER)<0) {
00037       cerr << "Stack initialization failed.\n";
00038       goto err;
00039     } else {
00040       cerr << "Stack initialized.\n";
00041     }
00042   }
00043 
00044   bzero(&server_sa,sizeof(server_sa));
00045   server_sa.sin_family=AF_INET;
00046   server_sa.sin_addr.s_addr=htonl(INADDR_ANY);
00047   server_sa.sin_port=htons(atoi(argv[2]));
00048 
00049   fd = minet_socket(SOCK_DGRAM);
00050 
00051   if (fd<0) {
00052     cerr << "Can't create socket.\n";
00053     minet_perror("reason:");
00054     goto err;
00055   } else {
00056     cerr << "Socket created.\n";
00057   }
00058 
00059   if (minet_bind(fd,&server_sa)<0) {
00060     cerr << "Can't bind socket.\n";
00061     minet_perror("reason:");
00062     goto err;
00063   } else {
00064     cerr << "Socket bound.\n";
00065   }
00066 
00067   cout << "Beginning to echo text.\n";
00068 
00069   while (1) {
00070     if ((rc=minet_read(fd,buf,512))<0) {
00071       cerr << "Read failed.\n";
00072       minet_perror("reason:");
00073       goto err;
00074     }
00075     if (rc==0) {
00076       cerr << "Done.\n";
00077       goto done;
00078     }
00079     if (write(fileno(stdout),buf,rc)<0) {
00080       cerr << "Write failed.\n";
00081       minet_perror("reason:");
00082       goto err;
00083     }
00084   }
00085 
00086  done:
00087  err:
00088   minet_close(fd);
00089   minet_deinit();
00090   return 0;
00091 }
